TopicTitle: Anyone have a ship they could share for orbit free-flying?

Articles.Content: [Didnt know where to post] Looking for a good ship to free fly with in orbit, Like the ships in Kinetic Freefall
This is the right place to ask, but it's not clear to me what kind of ship you're looking for. Could you be more specific?
I think he is looking for a highly mobile ship with infinite fuel turned on

[Didnt know where to post] Looking for a good ship to free fly with in orbit, Like the ships in Kinetic Freefall

The best help I can offer is to say, have a go at building it yourself. You will learn about the game and flying your own craft is 1000 times more satisfying! Give it a go dude.

The best help I can offer is to say, have a go at building it yourself. You will learn about the game and flying your own craft is 1000 times more satisfying! Give it a go dude.

This is 120% true.

You'll find what you're looking here:
